name: Perya!
description:
You visited your grandfather’s perya and it’s starting to lose its popularity. With your help, the perya can open more stalls to introduce more games to make the perya more popular and welcome more guests.

Perya's minigames:
  1. Ring Toss
  2. Can Knockdown
  3. Fishing
  4. Sharp Shooter
  5. Archery
  6. Basketball
  7. Coin Toss

Controls:
  • Trigger - Grab
  • Touch to interact with the buttons
Note:

This game was made by Team Tr0jan in 3 months for our Capstone/Thesis project.

Made with Unity and SteamVR. Tested with HTC Vive, We haven't tested its compatibility with other headsets.
